#define CLR(a,x) memset(a,x,sizeof(a))
#define PB push_back
#define INF 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MP make_pair
#define tr(container , it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it=container.begin() ; it!=container.end() ; it++)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define REP(i,a) FOR(i,0,a)
#define LL long long
#define VI vector < int >
#define PII pair < int , int >
long double x[128],y[128],z[128];
int n;
long double get(long double x1,long double y1)
{
	long double dis,ans=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		dis=(x[i]-x1)*(x[i]-x1)+(y[i]-y1)*(y[i]-y1);
		dis=sqrtl(dis);
		ans=max(ans,dis/z[i]);
	}
	return ans;
}
 
long double pos(long double curx)
{
	int iter;
	long double low,high,ans,mid1,mid2,time1,time2;
	iter=50;
	low=-1000000;
	high=1000000;
	ans=INF;
	while(iter--)
	{
		mid1=low+(high-low)/3;
		mid2=low+2*(high-low)/3;
		time1=get(curx,mid1);
		time2=get(curx,mid2);
		ans=min(ans,min(time1,time2));
		if(time1>time2)
			low=mid1;
		else
			high=mid2;
	}
	return ans;
}
 
 
int main()
{
	int t,i,iter;
	long double low,high,mid1,mid2,time1,time2,ans;
	while(scanf("%d",&t)!=EOF)
	{
		while(t--)
		{
			scanf("%d",&n);
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
				scanf("%Lf%Lf%Lf",&x[i],&y[i],&z[i]);
			iter=50;
			low=-1000000;
			high=1000000;
			ans=INF;
			while(iter--)
			{
				mid1=low+(high-low)/3;
				mid2=low+2*(high-low)/3;
				
				time1=pos(mid1);
				time2=pos(mid2);
				ans=min(ans,min(time1,time2));
				
				if(time1>time2)
					low=mid1;
				else
					high=mid2;
			}
			printf("%.8Lf\n",ans);
			
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
